snippet.title: Dark Souls II - PS3/X360/PC - Crown of the Sunken King (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Delve into Crown of the Sunken King, the first DLC of the Lost Crowns trilogy, and start your journey to reclaim the crowns that Drangleic's King Vendrick once owned.

Dark Souls II - Crown of theSunken King DLC will be available on  July 22 for Xbox 360 and PC, and on July 23 for Playsation 3

For more information, please visit the official website www.darksoulsII.com or your local Bandai Namco Games website, http://www.namcobandaigames.eu

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
